errorMinSigners: Number of signers must be greater than zero.
errorLowSignerThreshold: Threshold must be greater than zero.
errorHighSignerThreshold: Threshold cannot be higher than the number of signers.
helperSigThreshold: The number of signers required to approve a proposal on this project.
subTitleSignerAddresses: These addresses will be able to approve or reject proposals on this project.
helperNFTWeight: How many votes is this token worth?
helperChooseGovernance: Select a governance schema for your project.
helperVotingPeriod: The length of time where voting is enabled after a proposal is created.
helperQuorumERC20: The percentage of total possible token votes required, voting either "yes" or "abstain", for a proposal to pass.
helperQuorumERC721: The minimum weight of total available token voting weight required, voting either "yes" or "abstain", for a proposal to pass.
helperProposalPermission: The minimum number of tokens a member must hold in order to create proposals.
governanceDescription: These values can be modified later, through a proposal.
helperExecutionPeriod: The length of time the transactions on a successful proposal must be executed within before expiring.
helperTimelockPeriod: A time delay before the transactions on a successful proposal can be executed.
helperFreezeVotesThreshold: Total votes required by the parent (out of {{totalVotes}}) to freeze this child DAO entirely.
helperFreezeProposalPeriod: The length of time (in minutes) for a Freeze Vote's starting and ending point.
helperFreezePeriod: The length of time (in minutes) a successful Freeze Vote will freeze this child DAO.
freezeGuardDescription: This configuration may be changed later via a proposal on this child DAO.
helperParentAllocation: The total number of tokens to be divided amongst all parent project token holders.
helperTokenName: Enter the name of your governance token, i.e. Decent.
helperTokenSupply: The total number of tokens to be created.
descMultisigGov: Best for small groups and/or frequent onchain activity.
descAzoriusErc20Gov: Best for distributing power through liquid fungible tokens.
descAzoriusErc20HatsWhitelistingGov: Proposals can be created only by whitelisted Roles members.
descAzoriusErc721Gov: Best for adding governance capabilities to an NFT collection.
descAzoriusErc721HatsWhitelistingGov: Proposals can be created only by whitelisted Roles members.
labelTokenContractAlreadyConfigured: Your project is already configured with an ERC-20 token which will be used for governance with this modification.
helperAllocations: Any unallocated tokens will be placed in the newly deployed project treasury.
helperProposers: Only these whitelisted Roles members will be able to create proposals.
helperNewToken: Create a new ERC-20 token to vote with.
helperExistingToken: Use an existing ERC-20 token contract for voting.
errorNotVotingToken: This token cannot be used for voting.
snapshotHelper: Link a Snapshot Space via ENS to include offchain proposals and voting.
toastDisconnectedPersistent: You'll need to connect your wallet to deploy this project.
tooltipNftVoting: NFT Voting allows a group of ERC-721 (NFT) holders to propose and vote on transactions. Multiple NFT addresses can be used. <1>Learn more</1>
errorUnsupportedCreateOption: Previously selected Governance option is not supported on this network.
networkDescription: What network would you like to deploy this project on?
attachFractalModuleDescription: This setting controls whether Parent Project will be able to execute arbitrary transactions on Child DAO bypassing voting process on Child DAO.
fractalModuleAttachedDescription: This setting cannot be modified as Fractal Module already attached to the project.
